law.catch_line: An order may not be entered under any part of §§ 11-412 through 11-415 of this subtitle, except §...
law.text:
An order may not be entered under any part of §§ 11-412 through 11-415 of this subtitle, except § 11-413(a), without:
Appropriate prior notice to the applicant or registrant, or person submitting a notice filing, as well as the employer or prospective employer if the applicant or registrant is an agent or investment adviser representative;
Opportunity for hearing; and
Written findings of fact and conclusions of law.
